package.name: ksv_deleteOrder
package.summary: Our Delete Order Extension allows you easy to delete in orders simple drop-down selection.
package.description:
1. Overview

By default Magneto does not allow you to delete orders. Our Delete Order Magneto Extension allows you to delete orders in a safe way without any danger of losing data.

We provide three options to delete any order:

  • Delete any order from the order page list
  • Delete any order from the order page
  • Delete mass order from the order page list

    • 2. Features

  • Easy to delete order in back end seamlessly through the Action drop down box on the native Order Manager
  • Easy to install
  • Delete single order
  • Delete mass orders
  • Compatibility with Magneto Community Editions

    • 3. Installation Process

  • 1. Install the extension through Magneto Connect.
  • 2. Go to System > Cache Management > Click button Flush Magneto Cache.
  • 3. Logout out and re-login.

  • If you want to delete only a few orders, our Delete Order Magento Extension is the perfect solution for your business needs.
